=========
 Changes
=========

1.0.2 (2015-04-21)
==================

- Add support for PyPy, Python 3.4 and Python 3.2.


1.0.1 (2013-12-14)
==================

- By default, show filenames instead of module names.
  This cooperates better with IDE test integration.

1.0.0 (2013-09-27)
==================

Initial release
